response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is worth more than $1,500,000 to you. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a premium price, tailored to meet your specific needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
